attributes.action: Commision research to cure diabetes (type 1 and type 2), research that focuses on the cause not the symptoms of diabetes. This would save the NHS £9bn a year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes costs the NHS " The total cost to the NHS equates to £9bn-a-year." (The Guardian, Wednesday 8th October 2008).

There we the undersigned ask the Prime Minister to commisison research in to a cure for diabetes, focusing on the cause of the diabetes rather than the symptoms.
